alert.note: Alert for Kanawha (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 12:56PM EDT until September 12 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Kanawha County in central West Virginia... * Until 130 PM EDT. * At 1256 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Charleston, or near Charleston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Chesapeake, Marmet, Belle, Pinch, Institute, Coal Fork, Elkview, Tornado, Alum Creek, and Pond Gap. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 17. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 109. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 49 and 57. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 89 and 95. Route 119 between mile markers 69 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
